sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Does the Idea Questionnaire have sufficient and accurate data to move forward?
If No, please provide information on what needs to be updated by the Requestor</description>
        <name>step 97 - Script for Wells Fargo</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {


    var parRec = current.task_id.getValue('sys_id'); //Demand Record
    var asmtRec = current.getValue('sys_id'); //Assessment Record
    var metType = 'CMS - Functional Change Committee Review'; //Metric name

    var parent_record = new GlideRecord('dmn_demand');
    if (parent_record.get(parRec)) {
        var survey_response = new GlideRecord('asmt_metric_result');
        survey_response.addQuery('instance', asmtRec);
        survey_response.addQuery('metric_type.display_value', metType);
        survey_response.addQuery('metric.name', 'Select the appropriate outcome from the Functional Business Change Committee Review');
        survey_response.query();

        var outcomePar = [];

        while (survey_response.next()) {
            if (survey_response.hasNext()) {
                outcomePar += survey_response.string_value + ',';
            } else {
                outcomePar += survey_response.string_value;
            }
        }
        parent_record.business_case = outcomePar;
        parent_record.update();

    }
    var dmnResult = new GlideRecord('u_demand_results');
    dmnResult.initialize();
    dmnResult.u_number = parent_record.sys_id;
    dmnResult.u_select_the_appropriate_outcome_from_the_functional_business_change_committee_r = parent_record.outcomePar; //Alter the field of interest
    dmnResult.insert();

})(current, previous);]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>Gokul Nath</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-09-25 06:14:20</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>f904443c47edf950020ba9f8536d43c3</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>step 97 - Script for Wells Fargo</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_f904443c47edf950020ba9f8536d43c3</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>Gokul Nath</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-09-25 06:24:02</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
